data.name: DocumentMacroConfirmationRequest
desc: describes the request to approve or deny the execution of macros contained in a document.

properties.name: DocumentStorage
desc: refers to the storage related to the last committed version of the document.
This storage is necessary e.g. for displaying the existing signatures to the user, to allow him a decision whether or not to trust those signatures and thus the signed macros.

properties.name: DocumentURL
desc: specifies the URL of the document which contains macros whose execution should be approved or rejected.

properties.name: DocumentVersion
desc: contains information about the ODF version of the document
